updates.description: Poseidon Hindi Fix - Simplified Hindi language handling to work like other languages
features: Fixed Hindi speech synthesis by removing special handling
Hindi now uses standard voice selection and speech settings
Simplified language support for consistent behavior across all languages

updates.description: Poseidon Multi-Language Support & Network Fixes - Full translation support for Indian languages, improved Electron network handling, and enhanced speech synthesis.
features: Added automatic translation for Poseidon responses to match detected language
Full support for Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, and other Indian languages
Fixed network errors in Electron app with improved URL handling
Enhanced speech synthesis with proper voice selection for all languages
Translation API endpoint for real-time response translation
Improved language detection from user transcripts

updates.description: Major Enhancements - Memory System, Enhanced Commands, Improved Help, Hindi Support, and Common Sense Improvements
features: Cross-chat memory system - Atlas remembers your preferences and information across all chats
Enhanced command system - Added /help, /clear, /remember, /forget, /info, /think, /tone commands
Improved 'How to use Atlas' pop-up - Beautifully redesigned with comprehensive sections and better formatting
Fixed gems localStorage saving - Gems now properly cached for faster loading
Major Hindi language enhancements - Advanced text processing, better voice selection, optimized speech synthesis
Enhanced common sense prioritization - Better reasoning before web searches for natural conversation flow

updates.description: Poseidon 3D UI Beta - Added advanced 3D Poseidon animation option
features: Added 3D Poseidon UI (Beta) option in settings
Enhanced Poseidon voice assistant with optional 3D animation
Improved update checking to only show uninstalled updates
Better network error handling for Electron app

updates.description: Poseidon Fixes - Fixed infinite loop, network errors, and slow pop-up opening
features: Fixed Poseidon infinite loop (speaking and listening to itself)
Fixed network errors in Electron app
Improved Poseidon pop-up opening speed (shows UI immediately)
Better self-speech filtering and recognition management

updates.description: Extended and Enhanced Commands - Install custom commands to extend Atlas functionality
features: Custom command system
User-installable commands
Enhanced command parsing

updates.description: Poseidon Hindi Speaking Skills - Enhanced voice assistant with improved Hindi language support
features: Improved Hindi text-to-speech
Better Hindi voice selection
